Package it.polimi.ingsw.Network.Server

Class LobbyServer

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Network.Server.LobbyServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Server
public class LobbyServer extends Object implements Server
This class is the first to be created server-side, and it in turn creates a server socket which accepts all incoming connections. The connected clients are then logged into existing matches or into new ones, both created and managed by the LobbyServer.

  • Constructor Details

    • LobbyServer

      public LobbyServer()
      Constructor for a LobbyServer object. The constructor will create a first socket to which all clients connect first, to later establish the server they will be bound to.
